entities.name: george

entities.description: Harry and Ron's mother figure who is mentioned as scolding them.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who is mentioned as asking about Weasleys' Wizard Wh eezes.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is mentioned as not laughing at Ron and Ginny's joke.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Harry's sister who is mentioned as laughing with Ron.

entities.name: weasleys' wizard wh eezes
entities.description: A product that Harry asks about, described as a stack of order forms found by Mrs. Weasley.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends who are mentioned as responding to Mrs. Weasley.
George is also a friend of Ron's, mentioned as agreeing with him.
Harry and Hermione are friends who are mentioned together in the story.
Ron is Ginny's brother, mentioned as laughing with her.
Harry and Mrs. Weasley have a caregiver relationship, with Mrs. Weasley scolding Harry and Ron.
